data.title: SeeMyMats
data.meta_description:
On the link(s) below you can see my COLLECTION of beermats from Germany.
Note, where applicable, larger breweries (usually more than 50 beermats) have their own link to a separate website.  "Various" is a link to all the other breweries beginning with the specified letter where I only have a
data.text:
On the link(s) below you can see my COLLECTION of beermats from Germany.

Note, where applicable, larger breweries (usually more than 50 beermats) have their own link to a separate website. "Various" is a link to all the other breweries beginning with the specified letter where I only have a limited number of beermats.

For numerically named breweries, please see listings at Various A.
